text:
RADIO STATION KUSD
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH DAKOTA
VERMILLION
January 5, 1956
TO: John Holt, Waldo Abbot
John Regncll, Hugh Mix
FROM: Jim Slack
SUBJECT: Britain Today
Think that "Britain Today" has merit and should be
made available to the network. Probably the appeal of
these very British speakers with their very British
thoughts might be limited in some areas. However the
shows have a worthy and spontaneity which I enjoyed and
should fill a gap in present network offering. I vote
yes.
